title: Writhing Remains
info: The Writhing Remains is a pet item that can be dropped by Eater of Worlds in Master Mode at a 25*1/4 (25%) chance. It summons a pet Eater of Worms. It acts similarly to The Deactivated Probe, which is the Master Mode pet of The Destroyer.
stat:
Type
Pet summon
Use time20 (Very fast)
TooltipSummons the Eater of Worms
'It'll give you worms!'
Rarity13*
Sell5
Research1 required
